name: moon-map-wanderer
description: A finger pointing at the moon

scripts.start: budo index.js -H localhost --live --open --css styles.css --title 'pointing at the moon'
scripts.build: budo-demo index.js -c styles.css -i assets -m --title 'pointing at the moon'
scripts.deploy: npm run build; npm run cname; gh-pages -d dist; npm run clean
